name: 王多柏
objective: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1. 頻率響應分析，2. 回授放大器，3. 電路之穩定性分析，4. 運算放大器，5. 波形之合成與整形電路，6. 濾波器。
schedule:
Topics:
Ch5 MOS Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs)
Ch6 Building Blocks of Integrated Circuit Amplifiers
Ch7 Differential and Mulitstage Amplifiers
Ch9 Feedback
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quiz: 20%
Midterm: 30%
Final Exam: 30%
In-Class performance: 20%
materials:
Textbook:
1. 自編講義
2. Microelectronic Circuits, 8th edition. Sedra/Smith.
remarks: If on-line learning is required, we use Microsoft teams. The ID is z6hcisb.
